meeting_request.purpose: Feeling overwhelmed by first-year classes and my major
meeting_request.description: Hi, I’m Melissa, a first-year English major. I’ve taken two difficult classes so far and feel like I’m falling behind. I’m worried that I’ll fail these majors and feel like I’m not cut out for college. I’m also dealing with anxiety around school and personal goals. I’d like some support dealing with my first semester and how to manage academically.
